channel.title: Calderdale NAS
channel.description: This is the website of the Calderdale Branch of the National Autistic Society

item.title: World Autism Awareness Week 2015
item.description: For a chance to win fmaily Vue Cinema tickets, please enter our WAAW quiz. The deadline is by the end of Friday 17th of April.
For a chance to win fmaily Vue Cinema tickets, please enter our WAAW quiz. The deadline is by the end of Friday 17th of April.

item.title: Bric-a-Brac Stall Thank You
item.description: A Big THANK YOU to everybody who gave donations for our bric-a-brac stall, all the volunteers and everyone who came along and supported us on Saturday. Despite the very windy conditions we raised nearly £400.

A Big THANK YOU to everybody who gave donations for our bric-a-brac stall, all the volunteers and everyone who came along and supported us on Saturday. Despite the very windy conditions we raised nearly £400.
